CV

Basics

Name Rajesh Shrestha
Label Ph.D. Student
Email rajesh.45npt@gmail.com
Url https://rajeshshrestha.github.io/
Summary A 4th year Ph.D. student in Department of Computer Science at Oregon State University. My research interests are in the area of unsupervised learning including generative models, representation learning, and multi-modal learning. I am advised by Dr. Xiao Fu.

Work

  • 2023.04 - Now
    Graduate Research Assistant
    Oregon State University
    My work involves using supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to solve real-world problem and the theoretical analysis of the proposed methods. I am working on the use of pretrained generative diffusion model for conditional image generation, and solving inverse problem.
  • 2021.09 - 2023.03
    Graduate Teaching Assistant
    Oregon State University
    Collaborated closely with the instructor to develop and deliver course materials, and to provide feedback on student performance. I was responsible for developing autograder, grading assignments, and holding office hours.
  • 2018.10 - 2021.08
    Machine Learning Engineer
    Fusemachines Inc.
    My work involved setting data pipelines, developing machine learning models and their depolyment for various clients. The main projects that I worked on were Push Notification Recommendation System, and Optical Character Recognition System. I also worked on machine learning models for Fusemachines' products. In addition, I worked on developing contents for the online learning platform of Fusemachines called fuse.ai.

Volunteer

  • 2015.05 - 2015.05
    Nepal Red Cross Society
    Volunteered in the earthquake relief program in Nepal. My work involved distributing relief materials including food, blankets and tents to the affected people. I also worked in the installation of temporary shelters and toilets along with data collection regarding the damage caused by the earthquake.
